https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/vvcP9RrhXrNo3zUCW0R32hyppyH.jpg Under the slogan of the arms race of the superpowers, which escalates in the Cuban Missile Crisis in 1962 and brings the world to the brink of nuclear war, two exemplary post-war male figures challenge an almost archaic feud: Defense Minister Franz Josef Strauss and journalist Rudolf Augstein. Die Spiegel-Affäre
